text:
@GregAbbott_TX We are an affiliated group of medical students, PhDs, physicians and others keeping up with the latest research on COVID-19/SARS-CoV-2. We find the newest articles, read them, grade their level of evidence, and bring you the bottom line.  https://t.co/uYKpvhcHIo
 #covid19
